This is RealTalk

RealTalk Factchecker is a project initiated by a team of young, socially and politically aware millennials aiming to contribute to the fight against fake news and post-truth politics. RealTalk provides data-hinged perspective on issues mostly meddled by propaganda pretending to be objective information and topics that can be better viewed using numbers, facts, and official documents.

RealTalk

RealTalk Factchecker is a project initiated by a team of young, socially and politically aware millennials aiming to contribute to the fight against fake news and post-truth politics. RealTalk provides data-based analysis and perspective on issues mostly meddled by propaganda pretending to be objective information and topics that can be better viewed using numbers, facts, and official documents.
